examples.description: does not assign the invoicable or line items a project

examples.description: does not assign the invoicable or line items a project

examples.description: does not assign the invoicable or line items a project

examples.description: automatically assigns the line item the project of the invoicable
examples.full_description: invoicable project behaviour when updated via the API credit note it should behave like invoicable which has projects added or updated via the API PUT #update invoicable with a project without any line items adding a single line item with no project automatically assigns the line item the project of the invoicable

examples.description: assigns the line item the project of the invoicable
examples.full_description: invoicable project behaviour when updated via the API credit note it should behave like invoicable which has projects added or updated via the API PUT #update invoicable with a project without any line items adding a single line item of the same project as the invoicable assigns the line item the project of the invoicable

examples.description: ignores the param and automatically assigns the line item the project of the invoicable
examples.full_description: invoicable project behaviour when updated via the API credit note it should behave like invoicable which has projects added or updated via the API PUT #update invoicable with a project without any line items adding a single line item with a different project from the invoicable ignores the param and automatically assigns the line item the project of the invoicable

examples.description: ignores the params and automatically assigns the line items the project of the invoicable
examples.full_description: invoicable project behaviour when updated via the API credit note it should behave like invoicable which has projects added or updated via the API PUT #update invoicable with a project without any line items adding two line items with one having the same project as the invoicable ignores the params and automatically assigns the line items the project of the invoicable

examples.description: ignores the params and automatically assigns the line items the project of the invoicable

examples.description: updates the project of the invoicable, and assigns that to the created invoice items
examples.full_description: invoicable project behaviour when updated via the API credit note it should behave like invoicable which has projects added or updated via the API PUT #update invoicable with a project without any line items adding two line items and updating the invoicable project at the same time updates the project of the invoicable, and assigns that to the created invoice items

examples.description: updates the existing invoice item project to match the updated invoicable project
examples.full_description: invoicable project behaviour when updated via the API credit note it should behave like invoicable which has projects added or updated via the API PUT #update invoicable with a project with a single line item belonging to the same project as the invoicable changing the invoicable project updates the existing invoice item project to match the updated invoicable project

examples.description: only updates the invoice item project, and leaves the invoice project the same
examples.full_description: invoicable project behaviour when updated via the API credit note it should behave like invoicable which has projects added or updated via the API PUT #update invoicable with a project with a single line item belonging to the same project as the invoicable changing the project of the invoice item only updates the invoice item project, and leaves the invoice project the same

examples.description: only updates the invoice item project, and leaves the invoicable project the same

examples.description: updates the invoicable project, and also updates the project of it's line items to match

examples.description: updates the project of the line item that was requsted to be changed, but also updates the project of the other line item to match the project
